title: Sweet Wife, Pampered Fast - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Older Love Interests
author: 意沫沫
description:
Lu Xing zhi's 18th birthday gift was a handsome, wealthy fiance. Since then, the little lonely orphan girl turned directly into Ms. Rich Perfect and embarked on the pinnacle of her life.

After getting over a scumbag, she was drowning in a pampered happy life.

She merely wanted to hold tightly onto this golden thigh, instead of being left gnawed to the bone by that scumbag.

Huo Jinchen: 'It's my first time. Don't let me down.'

Lu Xingzhi: 'Old man, don't be so shameless.'

Huo Jinchen: 'This old man loves you dearly. Good girl, let your husband love you dearly.'

Huo Jinchen in the eyes of other: honorable and elegant, clean-living and honest, and a modest gentleman.

In the eyes of Lu Xingzhi: A black bellied old man.

'All right, I'll give you all you want, but you must never leave me.'

Lu Xingzhi nodded resolutely. This uncle has the money, the looks, a ravishing figure, and was so good to her. She would never leave unless she has a hole in her brain.

'What are you doing with your clothes off?'

'Seduce you.'

Love her and love her deeply. It's an essential homework for Huo Jinchen with Lu Xingzhi.>
